issue.title: [C++] CMake error when configuring AWS SDK
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15773](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15773). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am getting the following error:
```Java

CMake Error at /home/antoine/miniconda3/envs/pyarrow/lib/cmake/AWSSDK/AWSSDKConfig.cmake:132 (while):
  had incorrect arguments:

    "NOT" "TEMP_NAME" "STREQUAL"

  Unknown arguments specified
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:4326 (find_package)
  CMakeLists.txt:548 (include)

```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15773?focusedCommentId=17497274) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Oops, that's probably a conda-related issue, not a Arrow issue. Will close.
